Text: can we get some info on the video/audio streams please. codec/resolution/ar/source. thnx

I agree with oxycodone, is this x264/AC3 in a m2ts container?

Also, what is the benefit of m2ts over the more common mkv container?

Finally, why 3.99GB?  A single layer (DVD5) disc can hold 4.37GB.

I'm not trying to be a smart-ass.  I'd just like to know more about this unfamiliar file format.
the reas0n for 3.99 is so that it stores easy on a fat32 hdd...yes its ac3 ...very good quality enjoy
